title: DS Sidebar 1.6 latest
description:
Hi All

Sharing is caring, I owe PB uploaders - a return favour

This program is a cool application - It will give you the vista sidebar without the crap or the hungry resource requirements of Vista itself.

Excellent Tool for beginner to advanced alike who likes to know what is happening with there P.C. at any time - and all at your fingertips!

It will give you:

Memory leak detector (great for debugging)
Virtual memory and Disk activity status (who&#039;s doing what)
Desktop Slideshow viewer (a favorite of many)
Desktop Minibrowser and mini text viewer (yeah thats cool)
Alarm panel
Shutdown quicklink
Overnet panel
I.P. Panel (monitor your connection/ ports)
Weather forecast an worldtime panel





Nobody Can stuff this up
Simply extract winrar
Install DS Sidebar 1.6
then add each feature you specififically want

dont like something included - right mouse click and remove

there are links to additional files, however the files incuded here are the best that are available.

There is no Trojan/ viruse/ spyware or adaware in any of my files, feel assured!

Enjoy P.B. Lovers 

"theantivirus"
